Player History
Traded from Toronto to Anaheim on 2/26/2002 (Going to TOR: CF J. Edmonds. Going to ANA: CF V. Wells, LF M. Cepicky)...
Injured on 6/9/2002 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 7/7/2003, off Chris Carpenter (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2004, off Willie Adams (CHW)...
Injured on 5/25/2004 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/2005 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 9/7/2008 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 5/24/2009 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/1/2011 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/5/2012 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Drafted in 5th round, 134th overall pick, by Arizona in 2017...
Injured on 5/6/2017 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Arizona to Tampa Bay on 6/23/2017 (Going to TB: P A. Camacho. Going to ARI: SS C. Young)...
Injured on 4/25/2019 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Tampa Bay to New York (N) on 2/25/2020 (Going to TB: SS J. Johnson. Going to NYM: P A. Camacho)...
Traded from New York (N) to Minnesota on 2/28/2020 (Going to NYM: P K. Siegrist. Going to MIN: P A. Camacho, P T. Schulman)...
Drafted in 4th round, 74th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1978...
Injured on 7/21/1978 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
